The '''Steward''' is a member of his household. Unlike the [[Castellan]], the [[Master-at-Arms]], or the [[Captain of the Guards]], stewardship is not a military position. The Steward is charged with organizing servants and managing the day-to-day activities of a lord's estate. In the case of [[King]]s or high lords, stewards are nobles hailing from vassal houses.
sections.Known Stewards:
* {[[Harlen Tyrell]]}, Steward of [[Highgarden]] for King [[Mern IX Gardener]]. Elevated to Lord of Highgarden, Lord Paramount of the Reach and Warden of the South during the War of Conquest.
* {[[Vayon Poole]]}, Steward of [[Winterfell]] for Lord [[Eddard Stark]]. Traveled south with his liege and was murdered during the [[Massacre in the Red Keep|purge]] of the Stark household.
* [[Lothar Frey]], Steward of [[the Twins]] for his father Lord [[Walder Frey]]. Called "Lame Lothar" due to a limp in his left leg.
